Highlights Overnight in Barcelona, one of Europe’s most visually stunning cities, with the grace and distinction of the wide boulevards in the Moderniste Eixample. Stroll the lively streets at night or discover Barcelona’s passionate ambiance at a flamenco show. SPACCA NAPOLI & FOLDED PIZZA - Set off on a panoramic drive through Naples, passing landmarks that include imposing castles and elegant churches. Continue on foot through the bustling Old Town, where history comes alive in its lively streets. Along the way, pause to savour folded pizza, a beloved Neapolitan specialty created right here in the city. CLASSICAL CHOCOLATE & CAVA EXPERIENCE -Discover Barcelona’s sweeter side with a guided tour of a chocolate factory, where you’ll learn what shapes the flavours of this indulgent treat and enjoy samples fresh from production. Then turn to cava, Spain’s celebrated sparkling wine, as you gain insight into its traditional methods and distinctive local grapes.
